EmailTemplate.subject: London Lunch with Ben nye - June 15, 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Thank you registering to attend the executive lunch with Ian Penny and Ben Nye in London on Thursday, June 15th, 2017 at The Mercer at 12:00 PM. We look forward to seeing you there!
Please reach out to zoe.nageotte@turbonomic.com or your account executives for any further questions.
Best,
Turbonomic
